Structs/TranslationModel.html#/s:20Langu.name: owner
Structs/TranslationModel.html#/s:20Langu.abstract: Either an empty string, indicating the model is not a custom model, or the ID of the service instance that created

Structs/IdentifiedLanguages.html#/s:20La.name: languages
